languages.text: {n}Гнетущая тишина повисла над совсем еще недавно запруженной площадью. Собравшиеся люди оглядывают место побоища, явно не решаясь смотреть на вас... но при этом ловя каждое ваше слово. Неподалеку вы замечаете Мейв — девушка смотрит вокруг себя с ужасом в глазах.{/n}

{n}An oppressive silence hangs over the previously bustling plaza. The people are taking in the carnage, clearly avoiding looking at you but still catching your every word. You notice Maive standing nearby, gazing around her with horror in her eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Гнетущая тишина повисла над совсем еще недавно запруженной площадью. Собравшиеся люди оглядывают место побоища, явно не решаясь смотреть на вас... но при этом ловя каждое ваше слово. Неподалеку вы замечаете Мейв — девушка смотрит вокруг себя с ужасом в глазах.{/n}

{n}An oppressive silence hangs over the previously bustling plaza. The people are taking in the carnage, clearly avoiding looking at you but still catching your every word. You notice Maive standing nearby, gazing around her with horror in her eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}原本熙熙攘攘的广场，此刻笼罩着令人压抑的沉默。人们目睹了这场大屠杀，所有人都在有意避开你的视线，但依然仔细聆听你说的每一个字。你注意到梅芙站在你身边，以惊恐的目光环顾四周。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive silence hangs over the previously bustling plaza. The people are taking in the carnage, clearly avoiding looking at you but still catching your every word. You notice Maive standing nearby, gazing around her with horror in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}原本熙熙攘攘的广场，此刻笼罩着令人压抑的沉默。人们目睹了这场大屠杀，所有人都在有意避开你的视线，但依然仔细聆听你说的每一个字。你注意到梅芙站在你身边，以惊恐的目光环顾四周。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un silencio sofocante cubre la otrora bulliciosa plaza. La gente aún está asimilando la carnicería, haciendo lo posible por no mirarte pero prestando atención a todas tus palabras. Maive está de pie, mirando a su alrededor con expresión de espanto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive silence hangs over the previously bustling plaza. The people are taking in the carnage, clearly avoiding looking at you but still catching your every word. You notice Maive standing nearby, gazing around her with horror in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silencio sofocante cubre la otrora bulliciosa plaza. La gente aún está asimilando la carnicería, haciendo lo posible por no mirarte pero prestando atención a todas tus palabras. Maive está de pie, mirando a su alrededor con expresión de espanto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Daha önce cıvıl cıvıl olan meydanın üzerine baskıcı bir sessizlik çökmüş. İnsanlar katliamı idrak ediyor, açıkça sana bakmaktan kaçınıyorlar ama yine de her kelimeni yakalıyorlar. Yakında duran Maive'in etrafına dehşet dolu gözlerle baktığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive silence hangs over the previously bustling plaza. The people are taking in the carnage, clearly avoiding looking at you but still catching your every word. You notice Maive standing nearby, gazing around her with horror in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Daha önce cıvıl cıvıl olan meydanın üzerine baskıcı bir sessizlik çökmüş. İnsanlar katliamı idrak ediyor, açıkça sana bakmaktan kaçınıyorlar ama yine de her kelimeni yakalıyorlar. Yakında duran Maive'in etrafına dehşet dolu gözlerle baktığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}今までごった返していた広場に重苦しい沈黙が広がる。人々は虐殺に連れて行かれており、明らかにあなたを見ることを避けているが、あなたの言葉を聞き漏らすまいとしている。あなたはメイヴがそばに立っていて、目に恐怖の色を浮かべて周囲を見回しているのに気づく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive silence hangs over the previously bustling plaza. The people are taking in the carnage, clearly avoiding looking at you but still catching your every word. You notice Maive standing nearby, gazing around her with horror in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}今までごった返していた広場に重苦しい沈黙が広がる。人々は虐殺に連れて行かれており、明らかにあなたを見ることを避けているが、あなたの言葉を聞き漏らすまいとしている。あなたはメイヴがそばに立っていて、目に恐怖の色を浮かべて周囲を見回しているのに気づく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un silence oppressant plane sur la place auparavant grouillante d'activités. Les gens contemplent le carnage en évitant soigneusement votre regard, mais toujours aussi attentifs à la moindre de vos paroles. Non loin de là, vous apercevez Maive, qui observe la scène d'un air horrifié.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive silence hangs over the previously bustling plaza. The people are taking in the carnage, clearly avoiding looking at you but still catching your every word. You notice Maive standing nearby, gazing around her with horror in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silence oppressant plane sur la place auparavant grouillante d'activités. Les gens contemplent le carnage en évitant soigneusement votre regard, mais toujours aussi attentifs à la moindre de vos paroles. Non loin de là, vous apercevez Maive, qui observe la scène d'un air horrifié.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine drückende Stille hängt über dem zuvor so geschäftigen Platz. Die Leute bestaunen das Blutbad und vermeiden es offenkundig, dich anzusehen, hängen aber dennoch an deinen Lippen. Du bemerkst, dass Maive in der Nähe steht und sich mit entsetzter Miene umsieht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An oppressive silence hangs over the previously bustling plaza. The people are taking in the carnage, clearly avoiding looking at you but still catching your every word. You notice Maive standing nearby, gazing around her with horror in her eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine drückende Stille hängt über dem zuvor so geschäftigen Platz. Die Leute bestaunen das Blutbad und vermeiden es offenkundig, dich anzusehen, hängen aber dennoch an deinen Lippen. Du bemerkst, dass Maive in der Nähe steht und sich mit entsetzter Miene umsieht.{/n}
